name: BEES (ourhistory05)
description:
Did you ever hear about LDR? Long Distance Relationship? no? that is what is happening here, a real love story between 2 persons who meet each other on the internet. And this game was developed with the purpose to help me a little with the trip cost :'3

In this game you have to climb all the distance to meet the other bee avoiding the black bubbles and getting all the colored bubbles <3

Thats all! its sound easy right? HAHAA it is a sweety and simply game but you will suffer with it, i promess!!
